ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But those who have iman and do right actions - they are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who believe and do the right are surely the best of created beings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But those that believe and work righteous deeds, they are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The righteously striving believers are the best of all creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those who accepted faith and did good deeds – it is they who are the best among the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who believe and do righteous good deeds, they are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (As for) those who believe and do good, surely they are the -best of men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But those who believe, and do righteous deeds, those are the best of creatures;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And) lo! those who believe and do good works are the best of created beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, those who believe and do good works are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who believe and work righteous works - these! they are the best of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those who have faith and do righteous deeds—it is they who are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who have faith and do righteous deeds,- they are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, those who believe [in the Oneness of Allah, and in His Messenger Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) including all obligations ordered by Islam] and do righteous good deeds, they are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But those who believe and do good deeds are the best of all creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for those who believe and lead a righteous life—these are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [98:7] Truly those who believe and perform righteous deeds — they are the best of creatures (al-bariyya means alkhalīqa).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And) lo! those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, such as 'Abdullah Ibn Salam and his followers and Abu Bakr al-Siddiq and his companions (and do good works) acts of obedience privately between themselves and their Lord (are the best of created beings.
